Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.SgeUD936ILLwzJUZ]{Savant (Presence)}

Benefits

On a successful Presence checks to terrify, all targets within range are considered Shaken for 1d6 minutes. The effect ends immediately if the target takes damage. The TN of a Presence check to terrify is equal to 10 + the target’s WIS modifier + Miscellaneous modifiers, and the Combat Point Cost to Terrify is reduced by 4.

Normal

If successful, all targets within range are considered Shaken for 1d6 rounds and the effect ends if the character is attacked. The TN of a Presence check to terrify is equal to 10 + the target’s level + the target’s WIS modifier + Miscellaneous modifiers.
system.summary: Increased terrify duration, -4 CP cost, reduced TN
